text.section: The Department may award a technical assistance grant to a political subdivision or nonprofit organization to help families of limited income that are owner-builders or self-help rehabilitators.

A technical assistance grant may not be:
used to purchase land, materials, tools, or construction equipment or to pay for construction costs; or
awarded for a project of fewer than six dwellings.
